text: So is the fifth studio album by English singer Peter Gabriel and was released on 19 May, 1986 through Virgin Records. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Austria, Canada, Finland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain and went to number 2 in the United States. In 2020, the album was ranked #297 in the 500 Greatest Albums of All Time. ==Track listing== ===So (1986)=== ===So (2002 remastered edition)=== ===So (25th Anniversary Immersion Box) (2012)=== Notes *"This Is the Picture (Excellent Birds)" was not included on the original vinyl release. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1986 albums Category:Peter Gabriel
title: So (album)
